title: Exporting/importing/migrating TBird message filters (but not all settings)
content: I have two Windows 10 PCs running Thunderbird IMAP. They are or will be on the latest 64-bit version. I keep some settings separate, but I would like to copy my filter rules from one to the other system rather than enter every change twice. Is there a way to do this; a way that is not more complex than just retyping the rules?
